_comment_crossover_descriptions.subtree: Standard GP subtree crossover - exchanges subtrees between parents
_comment_crossover_descriptions.random: Creates new random subtrees at crossover points instead of exchanging
_comment_crossover_descriptions.point: Exchanges nodes at corresponding positions between trees

_comment_mutation_descriptions.subtree: Replaces a random subtree with a new random subtree
_comment_mutation_descriptions.node: Changes the value of a single node (function or terminal)
_comment_mutation_descriptions.random: Randomly selects between subtree, node, constant, or function mutation
_comment_mutation_descriptions.parameter: Only mutates terminal nodes (features and constants)
_comment_mutation_descriptions.grow: Extends terminal nodes into subtrees to increase tree complexity
